title: Prices of new skins
body: I feel like the skin that comes out is at least 1350 rp or more and i guess it looks nice but it is quite expensive, sometime the only good thing about the skin is the ability animation and not the actual skin itself like the up and coming hex-tech malzahar and some other skin. Some of the skin that came out like the play maker lee sin is pretty bad as lee sin have a lot of amazing skin.{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: Of course everyone wants to pay less for stuff, but the reality is you pay for what you get, and riot has opted to go for better quality skins that cost more but are ultimately worth it.

False, Mecha aurelion sol and high noon urgot were not quality, and they're overpriced and not worth it. Stop justifying their laziness towards underplayed champions who haven't had good skins for years, or even a skin at all.
